text: The 2003 Taça de Angola was the 22nd edition of the Taça de Angola, the second most important and the top knock-out football club competition following the Girabola. Interclube beat Sagrada Esperança 1-0 in the final to secure its second title. The winner qualified to the 2004 CAF Confederation Cup. ==Stadiums and locations== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! P !
